mapper.insert: insert into QNA_board(q_num, co_id, qna_title, q_regdate, qref_number, readcount, context, q_passwd) values(q_seq.NEXTVAL, #{co_id}, #{qna_title}, #{q_regdate},#{qref_number}, #{readcount}, #{context}, #{q_passwd})
mapper.update: update QNA_board set q_title=#{q_title}, q_content=#{q_content} where q_num=#{q_num}
update QNA_board set readCount=readCount+1 where q_num=#{q_num}
mapper.select: select q_passwd from QNA_board where q_num=#{q_num}
select count(*) from QNA_board where writer like '%'|| #{writer} || '%'
select count(*) from QNA_board where subject like '%'|| #{subject} || '%'
select count(*) from QNA_board where content like '%'|| #{content} || '%'
select count(*) from qna_board where #{search} like '%'|| #{search_content} || '%'
